thread.section_title: Sammydress 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Sammydress 的点评意见 | sammydress.com
thread.title: Maria Greco
thread.title_full: Sammydress 的点评人 Maria Greco

author: Maria Greco
title: Maria Greco
text: This company is full of liars, cheaters and burglars. Save yourself the aggrevation. Do not order from here. I placed my order on black Friday Nov2016. Here it is Feb 6 2017 and the order still has not been received. They will not reship or refund. I have been messaging them for 2 months and They led me to believe they would but I found out today they won't. Please! Do not place an order here!
